unnormalised: Hey, these athlete bios are awesome! Reminds me of "Chak De! India" somehow. Wonder if they'll cover someone like PT Usha next? Or maybe a deep dive into Abhinav Bindra's journey, from Dehradun to Olympic gold. Even stories of kabaddi players from Pro Kabaddi League would be inspiring. My college, IIT Kanpur, had some amazing athletes too! Hope they add more stories soon.
